DOC.HEADLINE: BRIEFLY : ENGINEERING
DOC.TEXT: Fluor Gets Contracts for German Plants : The firm said Wednesday it had won two contracts worth $ 16 million for engineering work to expand chemical and waste-water plants in Germany.Fluor Daniel , the construction subsidiary of Fluor Corp . in Irvine , will do engineering , construction and procurement work for Buna AG ' s chemical production plant in Schkopau , near Leipzig , Germany . The work is expected to be completed in 1995 . Another German firm , Elf Autochem Deutschland GmbH , also gave Fluor Daniel a contract to modernize a waste treatment plant in Leuna , Germany .
